description: The Wasabi Power BP110 Kit includes: 2 Hi-Capacity batteries with premium Japanese cells, 1 mini rapid charger (110/240V) with fold-out AC prongs, Car adapter to charge from your vehicle's DC/lighter outlet, European plug adapter for travel All items come with a 3-year manufacturer warranty.Note:This battery was not decoded at the time of manufacture. Your camera will not display the battery's run time and it must be charged with the included Wasabi Power chargerCompatible with the following Canon models:VIXIA HF R20VIXIA HF R21VIXIA HF R200
title: Wasabi Power Battery (2-Pack) and Charger for Canon BP-110, CG-110 and Canon VIXIA HF R20, HF R21, HF R200
